message.body: I have the afteroon free tomorrow. Do you want to go look at galleries in the Chelsea vicinity? I'm not exactly sure whats showing anywhere, but could look tonight. Alternately, if museums are more your pace, we could do that too. Hope your week has been good.
My week's been alright, unfortunately tomorrow is the one day I'm busy. Is there another time maybe this weekend or even into next week that works for you?
Saturday and Sunday both work for me, though on Sunday I will have a pile of books to contend with.
